msg: HTTPCLIENT-1417: Fixed NPE in BrowserCompatSpec#formatCookies caused by version 1 cookies with null cookie value

author: markt
msg: Extend the test case to cover RequestProcessors

author: markt
msg: Fix an intermittent failure with TestWebappClassLoaderExecutorMemoryLeak.

If the executor threads did not stop quickly enough, Thread.stop() was used. Sometimes this resulted in the executor not shutting down and the test failing. This makes using clearReferencesStopThreads marginally safer.
